name: ruining
content:

present participle of
ruin
B2 to spoil or destroy something completely: Huge modern hotels have ruined this once unspoilt coastline. Her injury ruined her chances of winning the race.

to cause a person or company to lose all their money or their good reputation: Cheap imported goods are ruining many businesses. If there's a scandal I'll be ruined!
